MESSAGE.subject: Creation of Meeting: [MEETING_NUMBER]
MESSAGE.body:
Dear [AUTHOR],

An external mission report is required for your duty travel to [DURATION]. A template with guidance for writing your report is avalable at [TEMPLATE_URL].

Please upload your report via this link by [DUE_DATE]. Your report will be edited and then approved by Senior Management prior to transmittal to Government.

Please contact us at MAC@wpro.who.int for any queries on this process.

Kind regards,
eMAC team

This is a system generated message from the [APPNAME].

MESSAGE.subject: [MEETING_NUMBER] | [MEETING_STATUS]
MESSAGE.body:
The record with number [MEETING_NUMBER] has been added by [AUTHOR] and is waiting for your approval.
Please click here to approve/reject.

Please contact us at MAC@wpro.who.int for any queries on this process.

Kind regards,
eMAC team

This is a system generated message from the [APPNAME].

MESSAGE.subject: [MEETING_NUMBER] | [MEETING_STATUS]
MESSAGE.body:
Dear [AUTHOR],

The meeting record with number [MEETING_NUMBER] has been approved. Please click here to access the report.

You will not be able to alter the details of this meeting until it is returned for further revisions.

Please contact us at MAC@wpro.who.int for any queries on this process.

Kind regards,
eMAC team

This is a system generated message from the [APPNAME].

MESSAGE.subject: [MEETING_NUMBER] | [MEETING_STATUS]
MESSAGE.body:
Dear [AUTHOR],

The meeting record with number [MEETING_NUMBER] has been finalized. You may access the meeting here.

Please contact us at MAC@wpro.who.int for any queries on this process.

Kind regards,
eMAC team

This is a system generated message from the [APPNAME].

MESSAGE.subject: [MEETING_NUMBER] | [MEETING_STATUS]
MESSAGE.body:
Dear [AUTHOR],

The meeting record with number [MEETING_NUMBER] has been disapproved.

Reason: [DISAPPROVAL_REASON]

You may access the meeting here.

Please contact us at MAC@wpro.who.int for any queries on this process.

Kind regards,
eMAC team
